tool_description: This API searches tax assessment, deed, mortgage and notice of default records filed in over 3,100 counties with Tax Assessors and County Recorder of Deeds offices. Results may include information as available about property owners, physical site and mailing addresses, land and building property details, and financial information. Searches may be conducted using an address only, or a name and address.
title: Property Report

api_list.name: /GetReport
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://property-report.p.rapidapi.com/GetReport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "property-report.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://property-report.p.rapidapi.com/GetReport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "property-report.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
